name: Zlydzen Wave Destabilizer
customPrimary:
Applies debuffs that ramp up in power in %s seconds, and fall off within %s seconds if the target is not hit by the beam.

The debuffs when hitting shields:
-%s to Shield Efficiency
+%s to Shield Upkeep

The debuffs when hitting hull:
+%s to Phase Cloak Upkeep
-%s to Armour Efficiency
-%s to Weapon Turn Rate
customAncillary: Hits on hull or armor frequently arc to weapons and engines, dealing extra EMP and energy damage. Hits on shields have a chance to generate a shield-penetrating arc based on the target's hard flux level.

%s charges: damage increased to %s, on impact explodes dealing additional %s fragmentation damage in big radius.
